title: karuNAkara murugan
sahitya:
karuNAkara murugan tirunAmam adanai maravAdiruppOr piravAdiruppArE


anupallavi

  sharaNAgatarAgap-perum tiraLAgat-tozhuvOraip-paramAnandam uravE parivODu pAlikkum


caraNam    kulaiyAmal manattinai nilaiyAgavE nirutti kumarA gurupara guhA sharavaNabhavA SaNmukhA ena
salikkAdu smarikkum sAdhanai sheidiDuvOr kalikAlam idanil veghu sulabhamAi uivAr
